ISSUE.TITLE: Add preview of tag descriptions when hovering over tags
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### NetBox version v4.2.4 ### Feature type New functionality ### Proposed functionality Add a tooltip feature that displays the tag description when hovering over it in the Device and VM general views. This could improve the user experience and enhance the usability of the interface. ### Use case Currently, the Device and VM views do not display tag descriptions. This creates a minor inconvenience for users, as it requires additional steps to access information about the purpose of a tag. ### Database changes This proposal does not include any database changes. ### External dependencies _No response_
